windows.command: Get-Process -Name dotnet -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object { $_.CommandLine -like '*blazor-devserver*' -or $_.CommandLine -like '*Profile.dll*' } | Stop-Process -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 7181 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_.OwningProcess -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }

osx.command: pkill -9 -f 'blazor-devserver|Profile.dll' 2>/dev/null || true; lsof -ti :7181 2>/dev/null | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true

linux.command: pkill -9 -f 'blazor-devserver|Profile.dll' 2>/dev/null || true; lsof -ti :7181 2>/dev/null | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true
